content: Construct a sentence with every word starting with a single letter of the alphabet, starting with x and going in reverse order.

Sure! Here's a sentence where each word starts with a letter of the alphabet in reverse order, starting with X and going down to A:

"Xenophobic wolves vex youths, vexing uproarious toddlers, silently rambling quaintly, precisely overcoming nervous mice, languidly kicking jolly infants, hastily grabbing fragments, exuberantly dancing carefully beneath ancient zephyrs."
